data.title: Local current time of Iran, Asia
data.meta_description: Find the current and exact local time of Iran, Asia, the sunrise and sunset time and the corresponding time zone.
data.text:
What is the time zone of Iran (IR), Asia? The answer is Asia/Tehran.

The current time of Iran (IR), Asia has a difference of 4.5 hours compared to the Greenwich Mean Time zone (GMT) at a longitude of 0 degree.

Geographic coordinates of Asia/Tehran

Latitude: 35.66666

Longitude: 51.43333

Sun relative's information

The following informations are estimates of the appearance and disappearance of the upper edge or upper limb of the Sun circle. They are based on the sunrise and sunset of the time zone's geographical coordinates. As the land is not always regular, it's practically impossible to get the exact time of the viewer's sun vision.

Sunrise

The sun will rise at 06:20:03

Solar noon

Sun will reach his highest point at 13:09:30

Sunset

19:58:57

Sunshine's hours

13:38:54
